title: NightOwl
summary: NightOwl is the world's first fully decentralized casino. It features stablecoin-pegged bets, profit-sharing, full transparency, and an open-source platform. The project has a website, GitHub repository, and presentation slides available.

qa_pairs.question: What is NightOwl?
qa_pairs.answer: NightOwl is the world's first fully decentralized casino.

qa_pairs.question: What are the key features of NightOwl?
qa_pairs.answer: NightOwl features stablecoin-pegged bets, profit-sharing, full transparency, and is open-source.

qa_pairs.question: What type of blockchain technology is NightOwl built on?
qa_pairs.answer: NightOwl is a decentralized application (dApp) built on blockchain technology.

qa_pairs.question: Where can I find more information about NightOwl?
qa_pairs.answer: More information about NightOwl can be found on their website, GitHub, and in their presentation slides.

qa_pairs.question: What are the potential benefits of a decentralized casino like NightOwl?
qa_pairs.answer: A decentralized casino like NightOwl offers benefits such as stablecoin-pegged bets, profit-sharing, and full transparency.

sections.heading: NightOwl
sections.content:
[Night Owl](https://www.nightowlcasino.io/) is the world's first fully decentralized casino 

- 🏛️ Stablecoin-pegged bets 
- 💵 Profit-sharing ⚖️ Full transparency 
- 🔬 Open-source 👀


- [Website](https://nightowlcasino.io/)
- [GitHub](https://github.com/nightowlcasino)
- [Slides](../events/pdf/Night_Owl_-_Ergo_Hack_lll_Presentation_Final.pdf)
